data.name: DR4X
data.detailed_description:
Discord Server


Before you Buy!

NOT MUCH TUTORIAL
- The campaign has a simple tutorial for kingdom gameplay, but none of the other many factions have tutorials yet. I will eventually add these though!

NO MULTIPLAYER
- Implementing multiplayer would require a pretty significant rewrite so probably won't make it in for the forseable future, but the AI is very challenging, it even beats me half the time. (though I may add it, we will see, but for now just assume no multiplayer)


About the Game

DR4X is a fast paced "Coffee Break" 4X game with nigh infinite possibilities and a touch of roguelike!
Do you want to be a bandit group trying to fight off the great entity destroying your realm, then change your mind and open your own gambling hall? You can do that!
Or you can be a Rat Pretender to the Rat Throne and unite the Rat People!
Conquer the world! Destroy the world! Be the world (Seriously, have you ever wanted to play as the barbarians in Civ, you can do that here!) Be a goat! Be a cult trying to fight off the evil goats while summoning your dark lord!
Or you can have a relatively normal strategy experience as a Kingdom in a (mostly) normal fantasy world trying to control the majority of the control points on the map! And much, much more!

Notable Features

  • Chaotic fast paced gameplay!
  • Fully voiced single player campaign as a kingdom called the Red Empire fighting off the horrors invading their world!
  • Highly customizable skirmish mode with nearly infinite possibilities!
  • Asymmetric gameplay!
  • Faction specific goals and win conditions! (And realm specific goals and win conditions!)
  • Voice acted units!
  • Unique and memorable OST!
  • Many...dimensions to uncover.

The Game

DR4X has an in-depth skirmish customizer and numerous different ways to play!

Each type of faction and sub faction uses different resources and completely unique playstyles.
Play in an evolving world, filling up with horrors and monsters if you don’t try to stop their spread, unique events and so on.

Research powerful technologies to dominate your enemies! Before your enemies can learn to dominate you!

Do you want to fight other empires? Or perhaps defeat the monsters infesting the realm. Or maybe even be the monsters infesting the realm! It is your choice!
Buy DR4X now!

It's also inspired by Doki Doki Literature Club and FNAF, but we recommend not thinking about that too much...

data.short_description: A fast paced "Coffee Break" 4X with nigh infinite possibilities and a touch of roguelike! Charming low poly 3D graphics, and comic book style 2D graphics, with many...dimensions to uncover. Inspired by Majesty, XCOM and Conquest Of Elysium and Warlords.
data.reviews:
“It's your fairly typical turn based strategy war game but it's got all the convoluted nonsense that normally comes with them shaved off leaving only the fun stuff behind.”
SonOfMowgef of the SonOfMowgef YouTube channel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might even run fine on older processors.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20ghz (6 cpus)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might even run fine on older processors.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
